articles.title: Cyberattack disrupts systems, causes delays at major European airports - CBS News
articles.description: A cyberattack targeting check-in and boarding systems has disrupted air traffic at several major European airports.
articles.content: A cyberattack targeting check-in and boarding systems has disrupted air traffic and caused delays at several of Europe's major airports, officials said Saturday, though the initial impact appeared to… [+4982 chars]
